guide.title: Mozilla VPN in the Firefox browser

blocks.content: If you use the Multi-Account Containers add-on in Firefox on desktop, try adding Mozilla VPN to your unique containers. You can even set different server locations for your unique containers.

Don’t use Multi-Account Containers? It’s a Firefox add-on that allows you to isolate your browsing for specific types of activities. For example, you can keep your online shopping data separate from your online banking data.
With Mozilla VPN, you can set your banking container to always route through a server location in your home country, making it even easier to protect your data and avoid fraud alerts while traveling.
